title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-9.1 - Annual reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-9.1 - Annual reports

State Regulations

Each permittee must submit to the Department an annual
report on its radioactive releases or disposals during the previous calendar
year. The report must list the radionuclides released or disposed of, and the
total quantity and the average annual concentrations of each. Permittees that
have installed fixed environmental dosimeters in accordance with a permit must
also report all dosimetry results. This report must be submitted by the end of
each March as described in section
380-1.3
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
380-9.1

Amended

New

York State Register April 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 17, eff. 5/10/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
